title: In situ photodeposition of loaded Co–MoSx for promoting visible-light g-C3N4 photocatalytic hydrogen production performance
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,927-933
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01515G, Paper
Yonggang Lei, Kim Hoong Ng, Chenyu Zou, Lejun Chen, Yuekun Lai, Jianying Huang
The Co–MoSx can efficiently catalyze H2 evolution reaction under visible light.
